edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.lextree

Class LexTreeLinguist.LexTreeHMMState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.lextree.LexTreeLinguist.LexTreeHMMState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreProvider, HMMSearchState, SearchState, SearchStateArc
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexTreeLinguist.LexTreeNonEmittingHMMState
    Enclosing class:
    LexTreeLinguist

    public class LexTreeLinguist.LexTreeHMMState
extends Object
implements HMMSearchState, ScoreProvider
    Represents a HMM state in the search space
